name: Love, Chris
description:
For my final year project at University, I wanted to look into Walking Simulators. I was intrigued by the constrasting opinions surrounding this genre and I was interested to create one myself. I feel this module has given me plenty of oppurtunities to better my 3D modelling and texturing skills, while allowing me the get a better and more in depth understanding of what it takes to create a game from start to finish. 

I am happy with where Love, Chris is at now, considering I had four months to conceptualise, plan, develop and design this game. However, I would also still consider Love, Chris a work in progress and I welcome feedback to improve it.
